subject: Job Application for Software Engineer Position
body:
I am writing to express my interest in the Software Engineer position at The Modern Dimension, as advertised on your website. With a strong background in business administration and a passion for software development, I believe that my skills and experiences make me a perfect fit for this role.

I have over four years of industry experience, with a deep knowledge of Java, JVM, performance tuning, and REST frameworks like Spring MVC and Spring Boot. I have also worked with relational and nonrelational data stores, including MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, and MongoDB. Additionally, I am familiar with caching infrastructures like Redis and Memcached, as well as queueing infrastructures like Kafka and RabbitMQ.

During my time at MILEMORA UNIVERSITY, I have gained valuable experience in text processing, spreadsheet, and slide presentation software. I am also a native English speaker and have advanced proficiency in Spanish.

I am thrilled about the opportunity to join The Modern Dimension and contribute to your team. I believe that my skills and experiences align perfectly with the requirements of the Software Engineer position, and I am confident in my ability to make a positive impact on your projects.

Thank you for considering my application. I look forward to the opportunity to discuss how my skills and experiences can benefit The Modern Dimension. Please find my attached resume for your review.

Sincerely,
Olivia Wilson
